page.description: Specify a style for the container that surrounds the Frame.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Frame container style]* can be used to add in-line styling to the container that contains the frame. For example, it can be used to add a background color to the frame:

figure.title: A frame with a Frame container style set to "background-color: #f5f5f5;".
